title: The Suvarnarekha Emerald & Diamond Haaram: A Heritage Masterpiece
features: Elaborate floral motif design with a prominent central pendant. Features intricate diamond setting around larger cabochon emeralds. The pendant showcases a cascading design with dangling gold bead accents, reminiscent of classic South Indian temple jewelry. Nakshi work detailing evident in floral petals. The necklace employs a linked floral design around the neck which is complemented by subtle emerald accents.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with vibrant green emerald accents
creating a rich and classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: Ideal for grand occasions such as weddings (muhurtham)
and high-profile social events. Also perfect for showcasing elegance at formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds, combined with the traditional Nakshi work, makes it a valuable heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting brilliance. Its design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a touch of modern elegance. It is a statement piece that reflects cultural heritage and refined taste.
